text: The President of Barbados is the head of state of Barbados and the commander- in-chief of the Barbados Defence Force. The office was created when the country becomes a republic on 30 November 2021. == List of presidents of Barbados (2021-Present) == List of heads of state of Barbados == References == President of Bahamas * Category:2021 establishments Category:2020s establishments in North America
title: President of Barbados
